function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Allocating resources for sustainable development initiatives, promoting technological and infrastructural advancements, and fostering affected workers, and encourage vaccination among the immigrant workforce.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Touch-free technologies","category":"Touchless technologies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of blockchain technology","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and testing of wastewater samples for sars-cov-2 can provide early detection and enable prompt control measures to prevent further spread.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement capacity limits, promote mask-wearing, and enhance ventilation in enclosed shared spaces. utilize touchless technologies for entry and exit
